snippet: An umbrella group could pave the way for international diplomatic recognition and more foreign funds and military assistance.
abstract: Syrian opposition factions sign tentative agreement to create umbrella organization, paving way for international diplomatic recognition as well as more foreign funding and improved military aid.

byline.original: By NEIL MacFARQUHAR and HALA DROUBI

lead_paragraph: An umbrella group could pave the way for international diplomatic recognition and more foreign funds and military assistance.

headline.seo: Syrian Opposition Groups Sign Unity Deal
headline.main: With Eye on Aid, Syria Opposition Signs Unity Deal
headline.print_headline: With Eye on Foreign Aid, Syrian Opposition Groups Sign a Unity Deal

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
